# SettingsButtons

## Add useful buttons to the Navigation Bar in Settings App

### SettingsButtons is compatible with iOS 13 and iOS 14.

** SettingsButtons gives a useful way of toggling dark mode, safe mode, or respring straight from settings, with a very clean look **

* Join my Discord today to report any issues: https://discord.gg/64kVRNzKnF

### Dependencies
* libsparkcolourpicker
* Cephei
* ldrestarthelper

### Source Code
https://github.com/nahtedetihw/SettingsButtons

### Follow

#### Version 1.5

* Fixed filter.plist, No Respring apply - thanks MTAC

#### Version 1.4

Added full prefs, you will need to enable the tweak after updating. Added FlashLight, Low Power, ldrestart (Requires ldrestarthelper on BigBoss). Fixed popovers not dismissing when application is exited.
